title: Static Analysis

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

certificate_analysis.certificate_info:
APK is signed

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title:
Content Provider (.contentprovider.NetalyzrProvider) is not Protected.
[[Content Provider, targetSdkVersion < 17]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Content Provider is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is a Content Provider that targets an API level under 17, which makes it exported by default, regardless of the API level of the system that the application runs on.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.[[Content Provider, targetSdkVersion < 17]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (.activities.DispatcherActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (.activities.MainActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object has a stack canary value added to the stack so that it will be overwritten by a stack buffer that overflows the return address. This allows detection of overflows by verifying the integrity of the canary before function return.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object has full RELRO enabled. RELRO ensures that the GOT cannot be overwritten in vulnerable ELF binaries. In Full RELRO, the entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) is marked as read-only.

rpath.description: The shared object does not have run-time search path or RPATH set.

runpath.description: The shared object does not have RUNPATH set.

fortify.description: The shared object does not have any fortified functions. Fortified functions provides buffer overflow checks against glibc's commons insecure functions like strcpy, gets etc. Use the compiler option -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 to fortify functions.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object does not have a stack canary value added to the stack. Stack canaries are used to detect and prevent exploits from overwriting return address. Use the option -fstack-protector-all to enable stack canaries.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object does not have RELRO enabled. The entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) are writable. Without this compiler flag, buffer overflows on a global variable can overwrite GOT entries. Use the option -z,relro,-z,now to enable full RELRO and only -z,relro to enable partial RELRO.

stack_canary.description: This shared object does not have a stack canary value added to the stack. Stack canaries are used to detect and prevent exploits from overwriting return address. Use the option -fstack-protector-all to enable stack canaries.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object does not have RELRO enabled. The entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) are writable. Without this compiler flag, buffer overflows on a global variable can overwrite GOT entries. Use the option -z,relro,-z,now to enable full RELRO and only -z,relro to enable partial RELRO.

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

metadata.description: Query Database of SMS, Contacts etc
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
metadata.cwe: CWE-330 Use of Insufficiently Random Values

metadata.description: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
Insecure Implementation of SSL. Trusting all the certificates or accepting self signed certificates is a critical Security Hole. This application is vulnerable to MITM attacks

metadata.cwe: CWE-312 Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive informations like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
This App uses SSL certificate pinning to detect or  prevent MITM attacks in secure communication channel.
App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
metadata.cwe: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
CWE-327 Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
metadata.description: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke platform-provided DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity', 'location'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

FCS_RBG_EXT.2.1,FCS_RBG_EXT.2.2.choice: The application perform all deterministic random bit generation (DRBG) services in accordance with NIST Special Publication 800-90A using Hash_DRBG. The deterministic RBG is seeded by an entropy source that accumulates entropy from a platform-based DRBG and a software-based noise source, with a minimum of 256 bits of entropy at least equal to the greatest security strength (according to NIST SP 800-57) of the keys and hashes that it will generate.

FCS_COP.1.1(2).choice: The application perform cryptographic hashing services not in accordance with FCS_COP.1.1(2) and uses the cryptographic algorithm RC2/RC4/MD4/MD5.

FCS_HTTPS_EXT.1.1.choice: The application implement the HTTPS protocol that complies with RFC 2818.

FCS_HTTPS_EXT.1.2.choice: The application implement HTTPS using TLS.

FCS_HTTPS_EXT.1.3.choice: The application notify the user and not establish the connection or request application authorization to establish the connection if the peer certificate is deemed invalid.

FIA_X509_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoked platform-provided functionality to validate certificates in accordance with the following rules: ['The certificate path must terminate with a trusted CA certificate'].

FIA_X509_EXT.2.1.choice: The application use X.509v3 certificates as defined by RFC 5280 to support authentication for HTTPS , TLS.

geolocation.country_long: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

strings: "preferenceTaskKillerSummary" : "Im Hintergrund laufende Apps die auf das Internet zugreifen stoppen, um Testgenauigkeit und Laufzeit zu verbessern"
"preferenceIMEISummary" : "The International Mobile Station Equipment Identity (IMEI) is a serialnumber that identies uniquely your device"
"worflow_step1" : "1. Para comenzar el test Netalyzr pincha en el botón Start. Te recomendamos parar otras aplicaciones antes de comenzar el test para reducir sesgos en las medidas"
"sponsor_text_short" : "Netalyzr's development is sponsored by the NSF, the DHS' Science and Technology Directorate, and by generous gifts from Amazon, Comcast, and Google."

"sponsor_text" : "El desarrollo de Netalyzr ha sido patrocinado por la National Science Foundation, el Department of Homeland Security's Science and Technology Directorate, y gracias a generosos regalos y donaciones de Amazon, Comcast, y Google."
"development_text" : "Netalyzr ha sido implementado por un grupo de investigadores del International Computer Science Institute en Berkeley, California."

"extraStatePartiallyUpWifi" : "Your network is partially up as we can reach your WiFi AP. However, it does not have full Internet connectivity. Please, reboot your WiFi AP and try again later. If it persists, contact your ISP"
"nodns" : "No tienes ningún servidor de DNS configurado en tu sistema. Por lo tanto, Netalyzr no puede ponerse en contacto con nuestro servidor"
"no_connectivity_string" : "No Connectivity: Please connect to mobile network or WiFi."
"error_message" : "There has been an error processing the results. Please, try again later."

"about_text" : "Netalyzr analyzes your connectivity in depth beyond latency and speed tests, reporting its findings in a detailed report. It also forms the foundation of a comprehensive survey of the health of the Internet's edge."
"workflow_step3" : "3. Wenn die Tests beendet sind, generiert die App eine Zusammenfassung der Ergebnisse. Sie können diese jederzeit lokal auf Ihrem Gerät einsehen."
"development_text" : "Netalyzr is brought to you by a team of researchers at the International Computer Science Institute in Berkeley, California."
"help_3" : "(3) Pincha ? para más información y una explicación detallada del test y los resultados"
"worflow_step1" : "1. Drücken Sie zur Ausführung von Netalzr einfach den Start-Knopf. Wir empfehlen, während der Tests keine anderen Apps laufen zu lassen."
"preferenceTaskKillerSummary" : "Stop background applications accessing the Internet to improve test accuracy and execution time"
"preferenceLocAwareTestSummary" : "Do not report location-sensitive information and device ID to Netalyzr servers"
"preferenceTaskKillerSummary" : "Permiten detener aplicaciones que estén accediendo a Internet para mejorar la calidad de los resultados."
"extraStateDown" : "Your network seems to be down. Please, try again later and if it persists, contact your ISP"

"about_text" : "Netalyzr analysiert Ihre Internetverbindung und fasst die Ergebnisse in einem detaillierten Bericht zusammen. Netalyzr bildet die Basis für eine umfassende Messstudie, mit der wir eine Übersicht über die Qualität von Internetzugängen zusammenstellen."
"preferenceLocAwareTestSummary" : "No enviar información sobre mi posición y dispositivo a los servidores."

"extraStateLatency" : "Your network is working but is too slow to run Netalyzr. Make sure you have good reception and run Netalyzr again. If the trouble still persists, you should contact your ISP. The measured latency is "

"extraStatePartiallyUp" : "Tu red funciona parcialmente pero no tienes acceso a Internet. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo más tarde y si el problema persiste, ponte en contacto con tu proveedor de Internet"

"worflow_step2" : "2. Mientras Netalyzr comprueba las propiedades de tu red, puedes utilizar otras aplicaciones o dejarla que se ejecute en el fondo. Puedes monitorizar el progreso de la sesión en cualquier momento pinchando en el icono de Netalyzr que aparece en la barra de notificaciones de Android"
"dnsConfiguredButInvalid2" : "). However, it does not respond to DNS lookups or it is not reachable."
"development_text" : "Netalyzr wird von einem Forscherteam am International Computer Science Institute in Berkeley, Kalifornien, entwickelt."
"error_message" : "Ha habido un error mientras se procesaban los resultados. Por favor, intentelo más tarde y disculpe las molestias."
"preferenceNotifySummary" : "Mostrar una ventana emergente si hay aplicaciones accediendo a Internet"
"extraStateAllOK" : "Your network seems to be fine but Netalyzr could not initially contact our servers. Please try Netalyzr again later"

"preferenceIMEISummary" : "Die International Mobile Station Equipment Identity (IMEI) ist eine eindeutige Seriennummer, anhand derer jedes GSM-Endgerät theoretisch eindeutig identifiziert werden kann."
"worflow_step4" : "Te recomendamos ejecutar Netalyzr periodicamente y en redes diferentes para poder observar posibles cambios en tu configuración de red"
"preferenceKillAppsSummary" : "Netalyzr kann nicht sämtliche Apps stoppen. Für optimale Resultate empfehlen wir vor der Testausführung manuelles anhalten via Einstellungen>Apps>Aktiv"

"privacynote_1" : "Wir lesen keinerlei Dateien, Apps oder persönliche Daten wie Kontakte oder Konten auf dem Gerät. Die einzigen lokalen Informationen die wir für unsere Analyse benutzen sind Ihre Position (auf Stadtgranularität), die 3GPP Basisstation, und ein Hash Ihrer IMEI (eine eindeutige Kennziffer die 3GPP-Geräte identifiziert), um zu erkennen welche Sitzungen zum gleichen Benuzter gehören. Alle anderen Informationen erhalten wir aus dem Netzwerk."
"service_notification_INETAPPS_CONTENT" : "Pueden alterar los resultados. Pincha aquí para abrir los ajustes y pararlas."
"help_2" : "(2) El mapa de colores indica severidad. Resultados rojos son anomalías a las cuales deberías prestar especial atención"
"privacynote_3" : "If you have any feedback, suggestions or concerns, drop us a note at netalyzr-help@icsi.berkeley.edu."
"exec_time1" : "Execution time varies significantly depending on the type of connectivity and the network latency. Typical execution times are as follows:"
"help_4" : "(4) Ponte en contacto con nosotros por email o visita www.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu para más ayuda"
"workflow_step3" : "3. Una vez finalizado el test, la aplicación genera un resumen de los resultados que es almacenado localmente para que puedas acceder a él en cualquier momento"
"privacynote_3" : "Si tienes algún comentario o sugerencia, envíanos un email a netalyzr-help@icsi.berkeley.edu"
"help_1" : "(1) Die Ergebnisse sind in Kategorien gegliedert. Wichtige Ergebnisse sind am Anfang zusammengefasst."
"extraStatePartiallyUp" : "Your network is partially up but it does not have full connectivity. Please, try again later and if it persists, contact your ISP"

"privacynote_1" : "Nosotros no inspeccionamos ningun fichero, aplicación, o dato personal (como tus contactos o tus cuentas) disponibles en tu dispositivo. Sin embargo, obtenemos de manera opcional la ciudad desde la que realizas el test, la estación base en el caso de 3G, y el resultado de una función Hash de tu IMEI (un código único que identifica tu dispositivo, de manera que no sabemos quién eres). El resto de la información se obtiene de tu red"
"exec_time1" : "El tiempo de ejecución varía en función del tipo de conectividad y la latencia de red que tengas en ese momento. Los tiempos de ejecución típicos para las diferentes redes son:"

"privacynote_2" : "Sie können das Auslesen Ihrer Position und gehashter IMEI unterbinden: (1) Klicken Sie in den App-Einstellungen oben rechts in der App und (2) deaktivieren Sie die Optionen die Sie nicht wünschen."

"intro" : "Debuggen Sie Ihr Internet.

 Netalyzr analysiert verschiedene Eigenschaften Ihrer Internetverbindung die Ihnen bekannt sein sollten. Wir testen beispielsweise ob wichtige Dienste gesperrt sind, wie es sich mit dem HTTP-Caching und der Proxy-Integrität verhält, wie gut Ihr DNS-Server gegen Missbrauch geschützt ist und ob NATs vorhanden sind. Die Ergebnisse finden Sie in einem ausführlichen Bericht.

 Drücken Sie den Start-Knopf um zu beginnen."

"extraStatePartiallyUpWifi" : "Ihr Netzwerk funktioniert teilweise. Wir können Ihren Zugansrouter erreichen, haben aber keinen vollen Internetzugriff. Bitte starten sie den Router neu, versuchen Sie es später erneut und kontaktieren Sie ihren Provider falls das Problem fortbesteht."
"extraStateDown" : "Tu red no está activa. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo más tarde y si el problema persiste, ponte en contacto con tu proveedor de Internet"
"help_3" : "(3) Click ? for test and result explanations. "
"survey_error_message" : "Die Testkonfiguration konnte nicht herunter geladen werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es später erneut."

"intro" : "Debug your Internet.

 Netalyzr analyzes your Internet connection for: service blocking, HTTP caching, proxy correctness, your DNS server's resilience to abuse, NAT detection, latency and bandwidth measurements, and gives you a detailed report when it's done.

Press the button to begin."
"preferenceIMEISummary" : "El International Mobile Station Equipment Identity (IMEI) es un número que identifíca de forma única tu dispositivo"
"dnsOK" : "Ihre DNS-Konfiguration ist korrekt. Die IP-Adresse lautet"
"dnsOK" : "Tu configuración de DNS es correcta. Su dirección IP es"

"generaloverview_text" : " Esta introducción te explica el funcionamiento de Netalyzr, la información recolectada, así como las formas de ponerte en contacto con nosotros para obtener más información y ayuda"
"survey_error_message" : "No hemos podido obtener la información necesaria para comenzar los tests. Por favor, intentelo más tarde y disculpe las molestias."
"sponsor_text_short" : "Netalyzr Entwicklung wird unterstützt von der NSF, dem DHS' Science and Technology Directorate, und durch großzügige Spenden von Amazon, Comcast, und Google."
"abortTestQuestion" : "Are you sure you want to abort the test?"
"worflow_step1" : "1. To run Netalyzr simply click the Start button. We recommend stopping apps running in the background before starting a session."

"worflow_step2" : "2. Während Netalyzr Ihr Netzwerk testet, können Sie zu anderen Apps wechseln oder Netalyzr im Hintergrund ausführen. Sie können die App jederzeit wieder in den Vordergrund bringen indem Sie das Netalyzr-Symbol in der Nachrichtenleiste anklicken."

"error_view_header" : "Desafortunadamente, Netalyzr no puede ponerse en contacto con nuestros servidores. Por lo tanto, no podemos ejecutar los tests en este momento. Por favor, espera mientras ejecutamos un test de diagnóstico"
"workflow_step3" : "3. Once the session completes, the app generates a test summary that it stores locally on your device so you can access it at any time."
"worflow_step4" : "Wir empfehlen Netalyzr regelmäßig und in verschiedenen Netzwerken auszuführen um mögliche Veränderungen zu identifizieren."
"help_4" : "(4) Kontaktieren Sie und per Email oder besuchen Sie www.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu für weitere Hilfe. "

"sponsor_text_short" : "El proyecto Netalyzr está patrocinado por la NSF, la directiva de Ciencia y Tecnología del DHS, y por generosas donaciones de Amazon, Comcast, y Google"

"worflow_step2" : "2. While Netalyzr checks your network you can put its execution into the background and switch to other apps. You can track the session's progress at any time by clicking on the Netalyzr icon that appears in Android's Notification Bar."

"preferenceKillAppsSummary" : "NOTA: Netalyzr no puede parar todas las applicaciones por tí. Para obtener mejores resultados, te recomendamos pararlas manualmente en los Ajustes del sistema."

"intro" : "Debuggea tu Internet!

 Netalyzr analiza tu conexión a Internet buscando: bloqueo de service, cacheado HTTP, proxies, la resistencia de tu servidor DNS a posibles abusos, detección de NATs, latencia y ancho de banda, y te proporciona un informe detallado sobre su estado una vez finalizado. 

Pulsa en el botón inferior para comenzar."
"error_message" : "Beim Bearbeiten der Ergebnisse trat ein Problem auf. Bitte versuchen Sie es später erneut."
"generaloverview_text" : "Diese kurze Einführung erklärt Netalyzr, die von der App erfassten Daten, und wie man die App optimal konfiguriert."

"privacynote_1" : "We do not touch any files, apps, or personal data (such as contacts or account information) on your device. "about_text" : "Netalyzr analiza tu conexión a Internet a fondo y muestra su estado en un informe detallado. Netalyzr también forma parte de un extenso estudio sobre la salud de Internet desde el punto de vista de los clientes."
"generaloverview_text" : " This tutorial introduces you to the Netalyzr app, explains the data we collect, and provides ways to contact us for additional help. "
